title: Intro to Distributed NoSQL Database Apache Cassandra
description:
We will help you understand the basics of building applications with Apache Cassandra. Using DataStax Astra, our Cassandra as a Service, you will get up and running as fast as possible.

Leave our 2-hour Intro to Cassandra session with a free-tier database spinning in the cloud along with an understanding of data modeling principles so you can be the NoSQL superhero.

- Discover what NoSQL is and what it can do
- Learn the fundamental NoSQL concepts with Apache Cassandra
- Get hands-on with NoSQL data modeling concepts
- Set up your own NoSQL database
